screen.Content:
Welcome

Hello and welcome to your induction.

Read the following message and then press the green button below to continue...

Replace this content by editing the Content tag.

Look at the instruction information below the screen preview for more information about customising this highly flexible e-Start template.

Look at the instruction information below the screen preview for more information about customising this highly flexible e-Start template.

Did you know you can remove and add further steps by highlighting a sub-screen tab in the "Edit XML" section to the right of the screen and pressing the Cut, Copy and Paste buttons in the bottom right hand corner of the screen?

Replace this content by editing the Content tag.

Look at the instruction information below the screen preview for more information about customising this highly flexible e-Start template.

Did you know you can remove and add further steps by highlighting a sub-screen tab in the "Edit XML" section to the right of the screen and pressing the Cut, Copy and Paste buttons in the bottom right hand corner of the screen?

An Introduction to the Induction

The following information is about the induction process. Examine this carefully before pressing the green next button.

Replace this content by expanding the first "screen" tag and then expand and edit the Content tag. Press the Reload button above this preview to see the changes.

Click on the Help button for more information about customising this highly flexible e-Start template.

Press the green button at the bottom of the screen to continue…

Replace this content by editing the Content tag.

Look at the instruction information below the screen preview for more information about customising this highly flexible e-Start template.

Did you know you can remove and add further steps by pressing the Cut, Copy and Paste buttons in the bottom right hand corner of the screen?

Introduction

We have put all the information you need to know in one place.
screen.Content_1: Press the green button or turn the page with your mouse to see further information about our company.
screen.information:
Click here for this screen's instruction video…

The content of the book can be edited in this template. The xml is split between the text outside the book, and the text and images inside the book. Main Screen: Title and Content change the text displayed to the left of the screen. Child Screens: Content tag defines the text and Image defines the background of each page.

screen.Content:
Add further pages to the book by copying this Screen tab and Pasting two copies (2 sides to each page) before the last Screen tab. This will insert an extra page. You can insert as many pages as you want to.

You do not need to format this text.

Click on each image to see further information about the company.

You will need to click on all the images before you can proceed.

Company Info #1

Replace this content by expanding the "screen" tag for the appropriate box and then expand and edit the Content tag. Press the Save button above this preview to see the changes.

You can also change the image by editing the appropriate Image tag.

You can also change the image by editing the appropriate Image tag.

Where are we based...?

Our company is based in a number of locations.

Click on the green button for further information.

Location A

Location B

Replace with Content 1 Label

Find out how we got to where we are today.

Test

This test will examine your ability to retain the knowledge learned in this course. If you do not reach the passmark then you will need to run through the text again until you can proceed through the course.

Replace this content by expanding the first "screen" tag and then expand and edit the Content tag. Press the Reload button above this preview to see the changes.
Complete the test before continuing ...

settings.Retake_Test: You have reached the end of the test.
settings.No_Issues: You have got 100%, no further action is required.
settings.Few_Issues: You have got very few questions wrong, there is no cause for immediate concern.
settings.Some_Issues: You have got some answers wrong, you may wish to retake the test.
settings.Many_Issues: You have got many questions wrong, we strongly recommend you redo the training.

screen.Title: Want to learn more...?
screen.Content:
You should be on your way now to creating a great looking induction course.

In addition to this we have over 40 e-learning courses which can be used to supplement your standard induction. Details can be found online. And since all the systems we produce follow the e-learning standard SCORM, you can run courses from any supplier on the same system as your induction.

You can remove this screen or alter it when you start to create your induction...

About the Course

You have nearly completed the e-learning - well done!

There are many options now available to you which we can run through before finishing...

Multi-Platform Deployment

e-Learning WMB make dozens of courses which consist of over 30% of the top 50 "e-Learning" Apps. e-learning can be customised and rebranded via your web browser and the same course delivered on both your computer and Smartphone.

Our course catalogue is available else contact e-Learning WMB for a quote.

Bespoke Development

Have an idea for an e-learning App or online course?

Let us know - we have a team ready to put your ideas into reality with our unique 3D e-learning development.

Rapid Authorware

Would you like to have a go at making a course such as this one yourself?

No problem - all our courses are made using the Jackdaw Cloud rapid authoring system. Visit www.jackdawcloud.com to start today - no payment necessary.

Well done

Thank you for completing your induction and welcome to our organisation.

Replace this content by expanding the first "screen" tag and then expand and edit the Content tag. Press the Reload button above this preview to see the changes.
